Edited December 17, 2013 by Monkthespy
One question how do you join an alliance.
You get invited and then you accept it in the alliances page.
Hey, I'm the game developer! If you have any questions about it I can answer them.
Not sure if you your what you say. *squints eyes*
I actually am! I saw your alliance which says youre from these forums, and I remembered I had an account here.
I am fed up with the Facepunch alliance. We could use more members to assist in defensive operations.
Welp after well clicking randomly last nigth i got to -6% ,but the UN saved my country.So now i can actually do things.

Yeah, Mantis (Streamline here) got into a war with IFAP (yes, that's facepunch) due to his avatar, they apologized though, nicely. No issue.

Also, as I've said before, you can put your nation name in this thread and I will invite you to the KSP alliance.

Ik i'm the U.S.K

Edit: guess what we got a bloc wiki page of our alliance http://blocgame.wikia.com/wiki/United_Kerbals .Designer feel free to change what on it as I tried my hardest to describe our alliance ,and stuff.

Edited January 17, 2014 by MGUARN
I know, just telling other people.
I could really use some financial help to assist my country get up and running after the previous war today.
what is it's name
Surimu-ka. Monkthespy is away for the weekend, by the way.

welp i too not doing well since my curiosity to the best me yesterday ,so i won't be able to send any aid at this time.I am saving up to fix my economy right now since the growth was hit really hard.Once I get my GDP up ,and raise my growth I need to focus on my quality of life since it dropped overnight yesterday (not to mention some U.N intervention which was good).Not to mention i need to prospect for oil ,and hopefully find oil to sell.
Any ideas on getting more members?
God damn it before I could even recover from the last war I'm in another one.
Well we could on the forum there to present our alliance.
How is the USK doing?
well we manage to fix our growth ,and manage to get foreign investments ,or how I say it "we recovered from the worst disaster ,since we let heremy fly the space station to the mun."
I'm back guys.
I just found this game and thread out... my nation is LVT-30ita (I had to do it, my favorite engine in the game )

I just found this game and thread out... my nation is LVT-30ita (I had to do it, my favorite engine in the game )

Added you.
yay more kerbal nations.
Sincerest thank you to the USK for the extra troops.
